doc.title: A Swing Opera
doc.plot: Two-reel musical-comedy update of Michael Balfe's operetta "The Bohemian Girl." A gypsy camp is filled with singers, dancers, and pickpockets. The gypsy queen, jealous of the budding romance of gypsies Arline and Thaddeus, gives Arline a stolen medallion. She is accused of theft and taken to the Hall of Justice, where she is discovered to be a nobleman's long-lost daughter. The gypsy queen sings "There's your happy ending," leading the chorus in song.
